alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Sumner; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:00PM CDT until July 08 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 400 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hendersonville, or 11 miles southwest of Gallatin, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Lebanon, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Lakewood, Old Hickory, Belinda City and Green Hill. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 224 and 232. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
